    publications

    Physics Informed Machine Learning of SPH: Machine Learning Lagrangian Turbulence

    Published in arXiv preprint arXiv:2110.13311, 2021

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Michael Woodward, Yifeng Tian, Criston Hyett, Chris Fryer, Daniel Livescu, Mikhail Stepanov, Michael Chertkov, "Physics Informed Machine Learning of SPH: Machine Learning Lagrangian Turbulence." arXiv preprint arXiv:2110.13311, 2021.

    Lagrangian Large Eddy Simulations via Physics Informed Machine Learning

    Published in arXiv preprint arXiv:2207.04012, 2022

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Yifeng Tian, Michael Woodward, Mikhail Stepanov, Chris Fryer, Criston Hyett, Daniel Livescu, Michael Chertkov, "Lagrangian Large Eddy Simulations via Physics Informed Machine Learning." arXiv preprint arXiv:2207.04012, 2022.

    Physics-informed Machine Learning for Reduced-order Modeling of Lagrangian Turbulence

    Published in Bulletin of the American Physical Society, 2022

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Yifeng Tian, Michael Woodward, Mikhail Stepanov, Chris Fryer, Criston Hyett, Michael Chertkov, Daniel Livescu, "Physics-informed Machine Learning for Reduced-order Modeling of Lagrangian Turbulence." Bulletin of the American Physical Society, 2022.

    Control of Line Pack in Natural Gas System: Balancing Limited Resources under Uncertainty

    Published in arXiv2304.01955, 2023

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Criston Hyett, Laurent Pagnier, Jean Alisse, Lilach Sabban, Igal Goldshtein, Michael Chertkov, "Control of Line Pack in Natural Gas System: Balancing Limited Resources under Uncertainty." arXiv2304.01955, 2023.
